txt.en: 'Candaith? The name doesn't seem familiar to me. I know this. We have hunted in the shadow of Weathertop and seen signs of a camp. It is possible that the man you seek camps there.\n\n'The camp can be found at the western base of Weathertop.'

'Hunters out of Bree knew of my whereabouts? I shall need to be cautious and redouble my efforts to hide my supplies in the future. \n\n'Now, what brings you to the foot of Weathertop? Surely you did not realize that there was a lone Ranger in the shadow of Amon SÃ»l who needed your aid?'
'Search the camp at the western base of Weathertop. Maybe the person you are looking for is there.'
Hunters in the Midgewater Pass may know the Ranger Candaith... it is certainly worth a try to see if they know the Ranger who watched the Lone-lands.
Talk to Candaith at his camp
Candaith is at his camp on the western side of Weathertop.\n\nThe hunters do not know the name Candaith, but they have seen the makings of a camp at the western foot of Weathertop.
